Description: Limestone stela of Pleinos(?); Chi-Rho within a wreath at the top; Greek text below; cross patee and two ankhs at the bottom.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.140)
Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.207, p.218)
Budge 1909 / Guide to the Egyptian collections (Sculpture). (281)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.238)
Exhibition history: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil'
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
